CENTRAL OHIO

Welcome to Firecrackers Ohio, a group of fastpitch softball teams located in central Ohio who proudly represent the national Firecrackers Softball Organization. Our mission is to provide our athletes with exceptional training that fosters both athletic excellence and personal growth. We are committed to developing confident, respectful, and resilient young women‚Äîon and off the field. Our teams compete across multiple age divisions, from 10U through 14U, each emphasizing fundamental skill development, competitive preparation, and building character through teamwork and dedication.

Our Teams

Firecrackers Ohio fields competitive teams across five age divisions: 10U Brown, 11U Nieman, 12U Allen, 13U Jones, and 14U Evans. Each team is led by experienced coaches who focus on building well-rounded athletes through skill development, strategic thinking, and character building. From foundational skills in our younger divisions to advanced competitive preparation in our older teams, we provide a comprehensive pathway for player development.

Meet Our Teams

Support Our Teams

Show your Firecrackers pride! Visit our official team store to purchase fan gear, apparel, and accessories. From jerseys and hoodies to hats and accessories, we have everything you need to represent Firecrackers Ohio with style.
